BSCS-1 MORNING-1

My Portfolio APIs project Blogr's Page

How To Use This App

So , how should you use this web app , this is very easy , first of all you can read the topic but in order to give any comments ,see other people comments, ask any question or give more info about the topic , you will need to create a account in here or logIn with google. So here are the steps to follow. There are two methods to logIn First is "GoogleSignIn"

  • In Home Page
  • At the top in the navbar click on SignIn button
  • A popup will open-up click on "signIn with google" button at the bottom of pop-up
In this way you can easily logIn your account with google. The other method is "email/password".
  • In Home Page
  • For this first of all click on "SignUp" button in the navbar , give valid email & password
  • After submission you will be successfully loggedIn
  • And whenever you will need to signIn you can use this email/password by clicking on "SignIn" button , enter email/password in the pop-up box & click on "Submit" button.
